title: Ooyukiumi no Kaina: Hoshi no Kenja

alternative_titles.en: Kaina of the Great Snow Sea: Star Sage
alternative_titles.ja: 大雪海のカイナ ほしのけんじゃ

synopsis:
A world blanketed in an endless and ever-growing ocean of snow. The people eke out a living, either huddled around the roots of enormous trees dotting the surface, or high in the canopy, which spreads over the planet's atmosphere.

A chance meeting between Kaina, a youth from the canopy, and Ririha, a young woman from the surface, sets off a chain of events that will change the fate of the world. 

(Source: Polygon Pictures)
